channel.title: Shop
channel.description: how do i add a command to open shops

item.title: Shop
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

if(command.equals("shop") { openUpShop((1); }

typed that from scratch lol

[code] if (command.startsWith(“shop”)) {
try {
int shop = Integer.parseInt(token[1]); // length of command
int maxShop = ShopHandler.MaxShops; // finds max shop
int shopNotAccesable = 68; // shop players can not access
String[] token = command.split(" ");

            if (shop <= shopNotAccesable && playerRights < 1) { // detirmens if they can acces the shop with their rights
                openUpShop(shop); // opens shop
            } else if (playerRights >= 1 && shop != maxShop) { // opens any shop the is not equal to the max shop
                openUpShop(shop); // opens shop
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such shop"); // is no shop
            }
        } catch (Exception e) { // start of catch
            sendMessage("Bad shop ID"); // catchs if there is a bad id for the shop
        } // end of catch
    } // end of command

[/code]

this the command i made

Read full topic
